title: A Space Ghost Christmas
synopsis: Space Ghost, Zorak, Moltar and the Council of Doom provide festive interpretations of classic Christmas tunes. These musical improvisations are nestled between three past episodes (they have been different each time the Christmas special has aired).

transcript.speaker: Choose a format
transcript.dialogue: Regular Table Indented Condensed

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: Welcome to a Space Ghost Christmas. There's snow everywhere, and we're in space, and other things are happening! Hey! Here he is now, the bringer of cheer and goodness, Spaaaace Ghoooost!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (invisos in) Here we are... (horribly pronounced "Feliz Navidad") Fell-izz Na-Navy-dad, citizens, and welcome to Christmas in outer space!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Look! It's snowing!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Sure is, my little nutcracker prince. (mumbles "baby talk")

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Snow! Snow! Snow! ... (keeps repeating in background)

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: I hate snow!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Calm down, my little Christmas goose! Come under the mistletoe and give me a smooch.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (stops saying "snow!") (stares at Space Ghost in silence) (pause) Snow! (pause) Bah! Humbug!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Don't be a Scrooge, Zorak! Tonight we're going to run some of my favorite shows, and sing some carols! (reindeer noise and jingle bells in background) Hey! Hey! What's that? (SINGS) "Do you hear what I hear?" It sounds like... it sounds like...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Who wouldn't know?

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ho ho ho,

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Look, it's my toe!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Up on the house top, click click click,Down through the chimney with good Saint Nick.First comes the stocking of little Nell,Oh, dear Santa, fill it well,Give her a dolly that laughs and cries,

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Wah!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: One that will open and shut her eyes.Ho ho ho!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Ha ha ha!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ho ho ho!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Hee hee hee!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Up on the house top, click click click,Down through the chimney with good Saint Nick.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (in background) Click click click, click... click... click click click.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yo ho ho,

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: And a bottle of rum.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Yo ho ho!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Click click click, (keeps clicking in background)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Up on the house top, click click click,Down through the chimney with good Saint Nick.Mmmm mmm. (hums to himself)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Click click click, ca-lick, ca-lick.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: (still humming) Oh, sorry.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: The stupid Christmas Special will be right back.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Kiss me, I'm missing a toe.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Welcome back to "A Space Ghost Christmas". Now, let's take a look at one of my prettiest interviews!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: You know, the smell of frozen snow always brings back the memories of when I was a little Space Ghost, in the choir!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Deck the halls with boughs of holly,

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Gabba gabba hey, gabba gabba gabba hey.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That's not how it goes!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Yes it is.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Oh. (pause) Moltar, start over.

transcript.dialogue: (rewinds tape to start of song)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Gabba gabba hey, gabba hey gabba hey,Gabba gabba hey, hey hey hey hey!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: That just didn't sound right.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Click!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Ehhh... Christmas is a warm time, a warm time of togetherness and family, of love and happiness. Y'know, that reminds me of the time Moltar was kidnapped! Heh heh heh heh...

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here they are - my most evil and hideous of villains from space, Metallus, Tansut, Lokar...

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: (hisses)

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Zorak, that's not very Christmasy... Brak, and Black Widow! They're here to sing "The 12 Days of Christmas"!

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: On the first day of Christmas,my true love gave to me,

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Hi, my name is Brak!

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: On the second day of Christmas,my true love gave to me,

transcript.speaker: Metallus
transcript.dialogue: Two plus eight is ten,

transcript.speaker: Brak
transcript.dialogue: Hi, my name is Brak!

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: On the third day of Christmas,my true love gave to me,

transcript.speaker: Lokar
transcript.dialogue: Three reruns of "What's Happening,"

transcript.dialogue: Two plus eight is ten,

transcript.speaker: Metallus

transcript.speaker: Brak

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Enough! That was pitiful.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Click click click.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Here's another show while Moltar bakes us some Christmas goodies. (sniff sniff) What's that smell, Moltar?

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: It's your butt roasting over an open fire.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Watch this next show, I've got a goose to cook.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Y'know, Christmas just wouldn't be Christmas without Zorak doing the dance of the candy canes for us.

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: What!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Come on Zorak, it's Aunt Mattie's favorite!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Uggghhhhuuuccck.

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, how about Jingle Bells?

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Okay! One two three four! (band starts playing) Hello Cleveland! Anarchy in Jingle Bell Land! Yowwwww!Jingle bells, jingle bells, yeah, alright!Jingle, jingle, jingle bells, yeah, wa-wow!God save the Queen! Yeah yeah yeah!She ain't a human being! Click click click click click click click!Hee hee hee! Alright! Thank you!

transcript.speaker: Kevin Meaney
transcript.dialogue: (appears for 0.5 seconds, looking puzzled)

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: Jingle bells, jingle bells, clickin' all the way,I bought some clickin' jingle bells for cheap at Pick 'n Pay.Jingle bells, eh, er, um... click click click click,Don we now our gay apparel! Yeah! Yeah! Yeah yeah yeah!Bring it on home, boys!Jingle jingle jingle jingle jingle bells! Yowwwww!Good night, San Diego!You cats are beautiful!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Well, that's it. Thanks for watching! See you next Christmas! Peace on Earth and good will towards men.

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: We wish you a Happy Birthday,We wish you a Happy Birthday,We wish you a Happy Birthday,and a Happy Birthday!

transcript.speaker: Moltar
transcript.dialogue: We wish you a Happy Birthday,We wish you a Happy Birthday,We... man, this bites...and a Happy Birthday!

transcript.speaker: Zorak
transcript.dialogue: A Happy Birthday, to you and your kin,we wish you a Happy Birthday and a Happy click click!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: Take me to the bridge.

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: Now bring us some figgy pudding,Now bring us some figgy pudding,Now bring us some figgy pudding,and bring some right here.

transcript.speaker: Metallus
transcript.dialogue: We wish you a happy merry,Merry merry happy birthday,We wish you a Christmas birthday,and a New Year's birthmas!

transcript.speaker: All
transcript.dialogue: Good tidings to you,And all of your flesh,We wish you some figgy pudding,and a nice Halloween!

transcript.speaker: Space Ghost
transcript.dialogue: We wish you a merry birthmas, and a Christmas New Year!

transcript.speaker: Announcer
transcript.dialogue: A Space Ghost Christmas has been brought to you by... by some things... right, right over there! Goodnight, everybody!
